title: Full Stack Development
desc: During my four years of experience I have developed several web applications from scratch using languages such as Golang, Python, NodeJS, C# and PHP mainly, covering various aspects of the development cycle such as interviewing and taking requirements with the client, designing the database and implementing the business logic and the presentation layer, with the use of modern languages and frameworks, as well as design patterns, allowed me to explore modern practices when implementing web applications mainly, such as routers, template engines, MVC model, ORMs and different architectures and communication protocols

title: Scrum and Jira
desc: As a developer in different work teams I have explored different agile methodologies such as Kamban and Scrum, mainly using Jira as a project manager, establishing communication to simplify project management tasks such as task assignment, prioritization and progress tracking. This has improved my teamwork, using daily meetings, sprint planning and retrospectives with teams from the United States and other countries using English as a common language.

title: Designing (UI/UX)
desc: I always seek feedback and actively listen to end users and designers, I am aware of the most used tools such as Figma and Adobe XD, implementing what we want to achieve in this aspect of development

title: Git
desc: Mainly using Git, Bitbucket and Gitlab as essential tools for control and collaboration in the code, I have always worked on these standards during the experience acquired these years, exploring different mechanisms and integrations that it offers.

title: AWS
desc: During my tenure at AWS, I effectively utilized various cloud services to optimize project scalability, reliability, and performance. In particular, I have strategically deployed applications using AWS EC2 instances, as well as storage solutions have focused on reliable use of S3, complemented by AWS RDS, while security has been a priority through expert use of AWS IAM, while complex network architectures with the use of Amazon VPC. My familiarity with event-driven services, for example Amazon Lambda, reflects adaptability to propose custom solutions based on project needs, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of the AWS ecosystem.

title: Azure
desc: In my different assignments I have explored different services and the Azure ecosystem in general, I highlight the creation of a pipeline for a solution made in C# doing the entire CI/CD cycle generating some artifacts with the project compilation

title: GNU/LINUX
desc: For years I have always been enthusiastic in the use of free technologies and trying different flavors of Linux as a personal use environment and as a development also, I have mainly explored Fedora, Centos, Ubuntu, Debian and ArchLinux showing me how the different components of a operating system and its administration works, also in my experience I have had to work on different flavors for both servers and clients, in development and production environments
